titleStmt.title: Apill [sic] 15, 1643 you are required to commend to God in your prayers ...
titleStmt.author: City of London (England).

notesStmt.note: Second part of title taken from first line of text.
Order to London ministers to support Parliament's army.
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall, London.
